sections.heading: 01|Administration and management of municipal university
sections.text: Effective:October 13, 1967Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 61 - 107th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFIn any municipal corporation having a university supported in whole or in part by municipal taxation, all the authority, powers,

sections.heading: 25, inclusive, of the Revised Code shall not be construed to limit in any respect the powers of the municipality, or the council wherein such municipal university is located, to provide by tax levy or otherwise for the financial support of such municipal university
sections.text: 25, inclusive, of the Revised Code shall not be construed to limit in any respect the powers of the municipality, or the council wherein such municipal university is located, to provide by tax levy or otherwise for the financial support of such municipal university.
